HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: 89 Kč for orders under 1499 Kč, free for orders over 1499 Kč

PARCEL_SHOPS.pricing: Packeta: 79 Kč. Parcelshop PPL: 59 Kč. Free for orders over 1499 Kč.

SUMMARY:
SUMMARY: GymBeam.cz offers three main delivery methods to Czechia: Home Delivery via PPL, Parcel Shop delivery via Packeta and PPL Parcelshop, and In-Store Pickup at their Prague location. Standard delivery for all methods is the next business day. Shipping is free for all orders over 1499 Kč. For smaller orders, home delivery costs 89 Kč, while parcel shop delivery costs 59 Kč (PPL) or 79 Kč (Packeta). In-store pickup in Prague is always free. 
NOTABLE FEATURES: Cash on delivery (COD) is available for a 25 Kč surcharge. Next-day delivery is standard for orders placed by 14:30 (or by 21:30 for Prague pickup). Weekend pickup is available on Saturdays at the Prague store. No explicit express or bulky item delivery options are mentioned.
WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is clearly presented on a dedicated 'Doručení a platba' page. The use of tables makes it easy to compare providers, costs, and delivery times. The information is comprehensive for standard deliveries but lacks details on weekend courier deliveries or distinct parcel locker options.
